top_comment.text:
Best new Senator; would hazard, *best Senator* currently seated.  The 
entirety of the rest of the government should hang their heads in shame, 
the way they've lost track of what they were put in office, by the people,  
to do.﻿
top_comment.author: Anthony Steele

comments.text:
...and the comparison to Cruz is a clear attempt to discredit her knowledge 
on the subject at hand. The banks would like you to believe there's nothing 
wrong with them not going to jail for what they've done.
comments.author: Anthony Steele
